thought: To fulfill the user request, I need to define the required functions first: a manual trigger, an aiCompletion action to generate SQL query, a postgres action to execute the query, and a slack action to send the result.
plan: Define trigger_0 as manualTrigger.default.default to start the workflow manually.
Define action_0 as aiCompletion.default.default to generate the SQL query from system and user prompts.
Define action_1 as postgres.database.executeQuery to execute the generated SQL query.
Define action_2 as slack.message.post to send the query results to the Slack channel 'general'.
After defining these functions, I will implement their parameters and then implement the mainWorkflow to connect them.
criticism: Currently no functions are defined, so I cannot implement the workflow. Defining these functions is the first step.

functions.comments: Manual trigger to start the workflow on demand.
Generate a SQL query using AI based on system and user prompts.
Execute the SQL query generated by AI in Postgres database.
Send the results of the SQL query execution to Slack channel 'general'.
